mapper.insert: insert into income (id, wages, ws_message, gains, gs_message, borrow, bw_message, ie_repay, iry_message, ie_date, uid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wages,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{wsMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gains,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gsMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{borrow,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bwMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ieRepay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{iryMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ieDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update income set wages = #{wages,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ws_message = #{wsMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gains = #{gains,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gs_message = #{gsMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, borrow = #{borrow,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bw_message = #{bwMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ie_repay = #{ieRepay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, iry_message = #{iryMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ie_date = #{ieDate,jdbcType=DATE}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, wages, ws_message, gains, gs_message, borrow, bw_message, ie_repay, iry_message, ie_date, uid from income where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, wages, ws_message, gains, gs_message, borrow, bw_message, ie_repay, iry_message, ie_date, uid from income
